hero.title: Home
hero.name: Markel Jaureguibehere
hero.description: Fullstack Developer | Bachelor in Computer Science

aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.description1: Software Developer with over 4 years of experience, originally from Puerto Madryn, Argentina . Passionate about new technologies and both web and mobile development.
aboutMe.description2: Graduated as a Computer Science Licentiate from the National University of Patagonia San Juan Bosco and with extensive experience working mainly with Node.js, React, and PostgreSQL. Currently available for work, motivated to keep learning and grow professionally.

description.3: Publishing and management of the PWA on Google Play.

anppv.title: AANPPV
anppv.titleExtended: AANPPV - Administration of the Protected Natural Area of the Valdés Peninsula

description.1: Development of the Dynamic Survey System for Península Valdés and management and information subsystems for the administration of the protected area.
description.2: Implementation of key features to improve the management of environmental and operational data.

mic.title: MIC - Interactive Cultural Map
mic.description: PWA application designed to centralize culture, sports, and tourism in one place. It facilitates access to cultural events and activities in your city, promoting local cultural participation and consumption. Available on the web and on Google Play.

tesina.title: Dynamic Topic Modeling in Chubut News
tesina.description: Undergraduate thesis project in Bachelor in Computer Science. News analysis system that identifies predominant topics in Chubut media and their evolution over time. It uses Machine Learning (ML) and advanced Natural Language Processing techniques for topic modeling.

anp.title: Dynamic Survey System for Peninsula Valdés
anp.description: Web platform designed to collect visitor experiences in Peninsula Valdés. The dynamic survey system adapts in real-time to users' responses. It includes internationalization and statistical indicator visualization.

vaidika.title: Vaidika
vaidika.description: Vaidika is an E-Learning website for yoga practice in Madryn. It features a Backoffice for uploading courses, modules, and classes, and a User App with login to access courses. Deployed in production via Ferozo.

cubegraph.title: CubeGraph
cubegraph.description: Personal side project to practice web technologies. CubeGraph is an interactive platform for Rubik's Cube enthusiasts, where they can train with resolution timers, 1vs1 local competitions, and analyze their progress with detailed statistics.

mapyzer.title: Mapyzer
mapyzer.description: Web application that allows the visualization of geolocated data with temporal validity. It allows the visualization in map/table, the creation of 'Projects' for data management and the import/export of data files.

fishing-app.title: Fishing App
fishing-app.description: Fishing app developed as a project for the 'New Technologies' class. It allows the creation of fishing profiles, loading and visualization of fishing reports, and Geofencing for the tracking of fishing areas.

moreAboutMe.title: More About Me
moreAboutMe.description: For a large part of my life, I have been involved in Handball and Beach Handball as a player. Therefore, I have over 5 years of experience as a coordinator and coach of all categories at the club J. L. Grilli in the field of Beach Handball during the summer seasons.

contact.title: Contact
contact.greeting: Let's talk! Write to me at
